queries.sql: UPDATE `navbar` INNER JOIN ( SELECT '11' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '1' `kode_navbar`, '1' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '31' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '2' `kode_navbar`, '2' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '33' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '3' `kode_navbar`, '3' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '34' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '4' `kode_navbar`, '4' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '35' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '5' `kode_navbar`, '5' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '36' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '6' `kode_navbar`, '6' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '38' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '7' `kode_navbar`, '7' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '40' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '8' `kode_navbar`, '8' `sort_order` ) `_u` ON `navbar`.`id_navbar` = `_u`.`id_navbar` SET `navbar`.`kode_induk` = `_u`.`kode_induk`, `navbar`.`kode_navbar` = `_u`.`kode_navbar`, `navbar`.`sort_order` = `_u`.`sort_order`

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: UPDATE `navbar` INNER JOIN ( SELECT '11' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '1' `kode_navbar`, '1' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '31' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '2' `kode_navbar`, '2' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '33' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '3' `kode_navbar`, '3' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '34' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '4' `kode_navbar`, '4' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '35' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '5' `kode_navbar`, '5' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '36' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '6' `kode_navbar`, '6' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '38' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '7' `kode_navbar`, '7' `sort_order` UNION ALL SELECT '40' `id_navbar`, '0' `kode_induk`, '8' `kode_navbar`, '8' `sort_order` ) `_u` ON `navbar`.`id_navbar` = `_u`.`id_navbar` SET `navbar`.`kode_induk` = `_u`.`kode_induk`, `navbar`.`kode_navbar` = `_u`.`kode_navbar`, `navbar`.`sort_order` = `_u`.`sort_order`
